name: Lighthouse: The Dark Being
description:
This script will install "Lighthouse: The Dark Being" CD edition for Dosbox.
Big thanks to people who gave their time to permit us playing this game in the best conditions.
notes:
- This script requires cdrdao and toc2cue to be installed. 
On Debian and Ubuntu type in a terminal: 
sudo apt-get install cdrdao
- You will need the 2 CD only during install
- Please report issue concerning this script on my github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/

script.custom-name: Lighthouse - The Dark Being - CD - Dosbox

execute.command: cd $GAMEDIR; rm -f -r *.toc; mv VOL.cue LIGHTHOUSE_CD1.cue; mv VOL.bin LIGHTHOUSE_CD1.bin; mv VOLU.cue LIGHTHOUSE_CD2.cue; mv VOLU.bin LIGHTHOUSE_CD2.bin; sed -i 's/VOL.bin/LIGHTHOUSE_CD1.bin/g' LIGHTHOUSE_CD1.cue; sed -i 's/VOLU.bin/LIGHTHOUSE_CD2.bin/g' LIGHTHOUSE_CD2.cue;

content:
custom-name: Lighthouse - The Dark Being - CD - Dosbox
files:
- script: https://github.com/legluondunet/mlls-tools/raw/master/scripts/copycd.sh
- conf: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/Lighthouse%20-%20The%20Dark%20Being/lighthouse_dosbox.conf
game:
  main_file: $GAMEDIR/lighthouse_dosbox.conf
installer:
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert disc 1
    requires: 9.CSC
- chmodx: script
- execute:
    args: VOL
    file: script
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert disc 2
    requires: movies/5.vmd
- execute:
    args: VOLU
    file: script
- execute:
    command: cd $GAMEDIR; rm -f -r *.toc; mv VOL.cue LIGHTHOUSE_CD1.cue; mv VOL.bin
      LIGHTHOUSE_CD1.bin; mv VOLU.cue LIGHTHOUSE_CD2.cue; mv VOLU.bin LIGHTHOUSE_CD2.bin;
      sed -i 's/VOL.bin/LIGHTHOUSE_CD1.bin/g' LIGHTHOUSE_CD1.cue; sed -i 's/VOLU.bin/LIGHTHOUSE_CD2.bin/g'
      LIGHTHOUSE_CD2.cue;
- task:
    commands:
    - imgmount d "LIGHTHOUSE_CD1.cue" "LIGHTHOUSE_CD2.cue" -t iso
    - 'd:'
    - call install.bat
    - exit
    drives:
      c: .
    name: makeconfig
    path: $GAMEDIR/lighthouse_dosbox_install.conf
- task:
    config_file: $GAMEDIR/lighthouse_dosbox_install.conf
    name: dosexec
    working_dir: $GAMEDIR
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: conf
